{"id":938458782,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1682257800,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/938458782/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Make All Array Elements Equal to 1","memory":"27.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minOperations(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        int ones = count(nums.begin(), nums.end(), 1);\n        \n        if (ones) {\n            return (n - ones);\n        }\n\n        int ans = INT_MAX;\n\n        for (int l = 0; l < n; ++l) {\n            int g = nums[l];\n            for (int r = l + 1; r < n; ++r) {\n                g = gcd(g, nums[r]);\n                if (g == 1) {\n                    ans = min(ans, r - l + (n - 1));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ((ans == INT_MAX) ? -1 : ans);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-make-all-array-elements-equal-to-1","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
